messages.startupErr: GanttProject failed to start. Please visit https://help.ganttproject.biz to get support.
messages.bundledJreErr: This application was configured to use a bundled Java Runtime Environment but the runtime is missing or corrupted.
messages.jreVersionErr: GanttProject needs Java 11 or higher. Please visit https://help.ganttproject.biz to get support.
messages.launcherErr: Java Runtime not found or is corrupted. Please visit https://help.ganttproject.biz to get support.
messages.instanceAlreadyExistsMsg: An application instance is already running.
